name: Pest Control. PC Version
description:
Pest Control is an addictive three level 2d shooting game.

This game is about a house which is in the middle of the countryside that has been infested by a swarm of giant insects. You are an exterminator and your mission is to spray as many as you can.

But be warned the insects move at an unusual fast speed and they have a poisonous spit.

This game can be played on any PC computer or laptop computer.
